ul_290072: specify shell for ssh session
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_290072: # in ~/.profile:
if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/bash" -a -n "$SSH_TTY" -a -x /usr/bin/bash ]; then
    export SHELL="/usr/bin/bash"
    exec $SHELL -l
fi
